meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of skin disorders.
meanings.sent1: The dermatologist helped me with my acne.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the dermatologist next week.
meanings.sent3: The dermatologist joked that my skin needed a vacation.
meanings.sent4: She was a dermatologist for the stars, keeping their skin flawless.
meanings.sent5: The dermatologist's clinic was filled with skincare products of all kinds.
